titles.title: To revive and extend until January 1, 1997, the suspension of duty on bendiocarb.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 9/28/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on 2,2,-dimethyl-1,3-benzodioxol-4-yl methylcarbamate (bendiocarb).
